mapper.insert: insert into member ( id, name, passwd, jikbun_cd, mw_cd, reg_dt ) values ( #{id}, #{name}, password(#{passwd}), #{jikbun_cd}, #{mw_cd}, replace(#{reg_dt}, '-', '') )
mapper.select: select seq_no from member where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into contact ( mb_seq_no, kind_cd, contact_no ) value ( #{mb_seq_no}, #{kind_cd}, fun_split_phn_no(#{contact_no}) )
mapper.update: update contact set kind_cd = #{kind_cd}, contact_no = fun_split_phn_no(#{contact_no}) where seq_no = #{seq_no}
mapper.select: select seq_no, mb_seq_no, kind_cd, fun_cd_nm(kind_cd) as kind_cd_nm, fun_mask_phn_no(contact_no, 'N') as contact_no from contact where 1=1 and mb_seq_no = #{mb_seq_no}
mapper.insert: insert into address ( mb_seq_no, postal_cd, addr, addr_detail ) values ( #{mb_seq_no}, #{postal_cd}, #{addr}, #{addr_detail} )
mapper.select: select seq_no, postal_cd, addr, addr_detail from address where mb_seq_no = #{mb_seq_no}
